item.title: White Wine Spritz
item.description: In the Glass Quantity Measure Ingredient Notes 4 oz White Wine Sauvignon Blanc or Pinot Grigio 6 oz Club Soda 4 dashes Orange Bitters “Feegans” or half and half Fee Bros. and Regans. 1 Lime Wheel Garnish Method Build in the glass. Bitters, white wine, then club soda.
